title: Di Maria completed his story arc as the most clutch Argentina player.

author: AdLucky2882
text:
DiverMary had one of the best flops I've ever seen in the final. Absolutely world class the way he pretended to get tripped, and was \*screaming\* on the ground as if he had just been shot: [https://streamable.com/o7hw1j](https://streamable.com/o7hw1j)

Absolutely 10/10 simulation, well done!

author: AdLucky2882
text: Really, or just the facts? I don't care about soccer, just calling it like it is.

text:
